check.name: ResourceTitlePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Title concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceTitle is present."
if(ResourceTitle is not None and len(str(ResourceTitle)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceTitle concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: ResourceTitle
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/title//*) or (/metadata/simpleDc/title) or (/*/title) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/title//*) or (/*/ShortName | /*/LongName) or (/*/DataSetId) or (/DIF/Entry_Title) or (/DIF/Data_Set_Citation/Dataset_Title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title) or (/eml/*/title) or (/resource/titles/title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/title)

(/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'featureType')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'product')]/keyword) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[contains\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode,'dataResolution')]/keyword) or (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/descriptiveKeywords/MD_Keywords[normalize-space\(type/MD_KeywordTypeCode)='place']/keyword//*) or check.description: Checks to see if at least one Related Resource Identifier concept exists.

def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept RelatedResourceIdentifier is present."
if(RelatedResourceIdentifier is not None and len(str(RelatedResourceIdentifier)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "RelatedResourceIdentifier concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: RelatedResourceIdentifier
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/associatedResource/MD_AssociatedResource/name/CI_Citation/identifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/DryadDataPackage/external) or (/DryadDataFile/isPartOf) or (/DryadDataPackage/references) or (/DryadDataPackage/hasPart) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/aggregationInfo/MD_AggregateInformation/aggregateDataSetIdentifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/extent/EX_Extent/geographicElement/EX_GeographicDescription/geographicIdentifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/processingLevel/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/*/dataQualityInfo/DQ_DataQuality/report/DQ_AccuracyOfATimeMeasurement/measureIdentification/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/MI_Metadata/acquisitionInformation/MI_AcquisitionInformation/operation/MI_Operation/identifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/MI_Metadata/acquisitionInformation/MI_AcquisitionInformation/platform/*/identifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/MI_Metadata/acquisitionInformation/MI_AcquisitionInformation/instrument/*/identifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/MI_Metadata/acquisitionInformation/MI_AcquisitionInformation/sensor/EOS_Sensor/identifier/MD_Identifier/code//*) or (/*/ShortName) or (/*/Spatial/HorizontalSpatialDomain/ZoneIdentifier) or (/*/ProcessingLevelId) or (/*/Campaigns/Campaign/ShortName | /*/Campaigns/Campaign/LongName) or (/*/Platforms/Platform/ShortName | /*/Platforms/Platform/LongName) or (/*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/ShortName | /*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/LongName) or (/*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/Sensors/Sensor/ShortName | /*/Platforms/Platform/Instruments/Instrument/Sensors/Sensor/LongName) or (/*/AssociatedDIFs/DIF/EntryId) or (/metadata/dcTerms/hasPart) or (/metadata/dcTerms/references) or (/eml/*/project/@id) or (/resource/relatedIdentifiers/relatedIdentifier) or (/metadata/mercury/Granule_Details/Granule/Granule_ID)
